channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EazyDocs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EazyDocs

item.title: CVE-2024-0248|2024-02-12T16:07:33.907Z -- Unknown -- EazyDocs
item.description: The EazyDocs WordPress plugin before 2.4.0 re-introduced CVE-2023-6029 (https://wpscan.com/vulnerability/7a0aaf85-8130-4fd7-8f09-f8edc929597e/) in 2.3.8, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to delete arbitrary posts, as well as add and delete documents/sections. The issue was partially fixed in 2.3.9.
